full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RDO RJE'I SEMS DPA' BYABS KHRUS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @056A *, ,ZHES PA 'DI NI TSUL KHRIMS DANG RTZIS DKAR NAG GI RIG PA'I YON TAN GYI RGYAN DANG LDAN PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BSTAN PA DANG, RTZIS DKAR NAG DANG GSO BA RIG PA'I RGYAN DANG LDAN PA BLO BZANG NOR BU SMAN PA ZHES BYA BA GNYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, ,KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYIS BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SNGON GYI MKHAS PA'I GSUNG LA BRTEN NAS BRIS PA'O, ,BKRA SHIS, ,)
